TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit MembershipUserCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class MembershipUserCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class MembershipUserCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type MembershipUserCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

span.span: A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个从返回， ，和方法的类。A is returned from the , , and methods of the class. 返回的对象， ，和方法包含成员资格数据存储区中的用户信息的快照。The objects returned by the , , and methods contain a snapshot of user information in the membership data store. 也就是说，将更改为中的成员资格用户信息不会反映在成员资格数据存储。That is, changes to the membership user information in a are not reflected in the membership data store. 若要修改成员资格数据存储区中的成员资格用户信息，请使用，并方法的类。To modify membership user information in the membership data store, use the , and methods of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[成员资格简介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100))然后再继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回一组成员资格用户的用户数的计数与当前已联机。The following code example returns a list of membership users with a count of the number of users currently online. 配置为使用成员资格的 ASP.NET 应用程序的示例，请参阅类。For an example of an ASP.NET application configured to use membership, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/ShowUserscs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/ShowUsersvb.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回对象属性包含成员资格数据存储区中的用户信息的快照。The object returned by property contains a snapshot of user information in the membership data store. 也就是说，将更改为中的成员资格用户信息不会反映在成员资格数据存储。That is, changes to the membership user information in the are not reflected in the membership data store. 若要修改成员资格数据存储区中的成员资格用户信息，请使用， ，和方法。To modify membership user information in the membership data store, use the , , and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的所有成员资格用户名，并显示选定的用户名称的特定成员资格信息。The following code example displays all membership user names in a and shows specific membership information for the selected user name. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetReadOnly() cil managed

summary.span: 将成员资格用户集合的内容设为只读。

span.span: Makes the contents of the membership user collection read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容被视为只读的因为它们是成员资格数据存储区中的成员资格用户信息的快照。The contents of a are considered read-only, as they are a snapshot of the membership user information in the membership data store. 使用成员资格用户信息进行修改，和方法。Membership user information is modified using the , and methods. 方法标记为只读的以便对象不能添加到或从集合中移除。The method marks the as read-only so that objects cannot be added to or removed from the collection. 属性值的对象未标记为只读的。Property values for the objects are not marked as read-only. 也就是说，可以修改的属性值中而不考虑是否将集合标记为只读的方法。That is, you can modify the property values of a in the regardless of whether the collection has been marked as read-only by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将返回的所有用户从成员资格数据存储。The following code example returns all of the users from the membership data store. 返回标记为只读的基于`Boolean`由调用方指定的参数。The returned is marked as read-only based on a `Boolean` parameter specified by the caller. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/snippetscs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#5)]
